SELECT o.ID AS orderId, o.PRODUCT_ID AS productId, p.PRODUCT_NAME AS productName,
(SELECT pi.PRODUCT_IMAGE_PATH || pi.PRODUCT_IMAGE_NAME FROM TBL_PRODUCT_IMAGE pi WHERE pi.PRODUCT_ID = p.ID AND pi.PRODUCT_IMAGE_TYPE = 'MAIN' AND ROWNUM = 1) AS productMainImageUrl,
o.ORDER_CREATE_AT AS orderCreateAt, pay.PAYMENT_STATUS AS paymentStatus, o.ORDER_STATUS AS orderStatus FROM TBL_ORDER o JOIN TBL_PRODUCT p ON p.ID = o.PRODUCT_ID JOIN TBL_PAYMENT pay ON pay.ORDER_ID = o.ID WHERE o.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND pay.PAYMENT_STATUS = 'COMPLETED' ORDER BY o.ID DESC
